title: Plate, 1760s–80s
markings: On underside; signature "MPO" in light brown underglaze; paper label, "1491"
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2008: acquired by Museum
dimensions: H x diam.: 3.5 x 22.9 cm (1 3/8 in. x 9 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Octagonal form with fluted rim with thick dark green border; center well decorated with three Comedia del'arte/Callot figures and foliage in green and ochre on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph: Plate, 1760s–80s.Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2008-40-2.
